title: World Leader in Corruption Control
description: In 2023, Denmark achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Control of Corruption Percentile Rank, indicating the highest level of corruption control globally.

title: Top Renewable Energy Producer
description: As of 2021, 78.91% of Denmark's electricity production came from renewable sources, excluding hydroelectric, placing it among the top countries in renewable energy usage.

title: Universal Financial Inclusion
description: By 2021, Denmark achieved 100% account ownership at financial institutions across various demographics, including the poorest 40%, older adults, and those with secondary education or more.

title: Exemplary Government Effectiveness
description: In 2023, Denmark's Government Effectiveness Percentile Rank reached the upper bound of 100, showcasing its exceptional governance standards.

title: High Statistical Performance
description: Denmark scored 95.26 on the Statistical Performance Indicators (SPI) in 2023, reflecting its robust data and statistical systems.

title: Decline in Domestic Economic Claims
description: In 2023, Denmark experienced a -16.24% growth in claims on other sectors of the domestic economy as a percentage of broad money, indicating a contraction in this area.
